categories: Category:Alliance to Restore the Republic starships

nodes.text: The Folding Dancer was a Rebel Nova Courier that operated during the Galactic Civil War.

During 1 ABY, Captain Denner of the Imperial Storm Squadron sent an Imperial pilot to destroy the Folding Dancer and its escort in the Endor system. The pilot carried out the task successfully, destroying the Folding Dancer in addition to the two X-wings and four Z-95 Headhunters that were escorting it.
